question: Fetus most radiosensitive at?
exp: Ans. (a) 8-15 weeksRef.: Radiation Injury Prevention and Mitigation in Human by Kedar N. Prasad p-62
topic_name: Growth of the Fetus During Pregnancy

question: Deoxygenated blood from the fetus to the mother is via:
exp: 13Ans. (a) Umbilical arteryRef: D. C Dutta 8th ed./ 36* Deoxygenated blood from fetus to mother is via umbilical artery.* Oxygenated blood is via umbilical vein.
topic_name: Growth of the Fetus During Pregnancy
